cast.name: 杰瑞·布鲁克海默 Jerry Bruckheimer
奥兰多·布鲁姆 Orlando Bloom
杰克·达文波特 Jack Davenport

this_title: An Epic at Sea: The Making of 'Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl'
trans_title: 《加勒比海盗：黑珍珠号诅咒》制作花絮：海上传奇
introduction: This made-for-DVD documentary details the work that went into the production of Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl, Disney's blockbuster tale of adventure on the high seas. Action fans are treated to a behind-the-scenes look at the making of this masterpiece of special-effects work, as well as to interviews with the director, the producer, and just about eve...
chinese_title: 《加勒比海盗：黑珍珠号诅咒》制作花絮：海上传奇
foreign_title: An Epic at Sea: The Making of 'Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl'
